chara.textHome:
I am Darc... I heard the call of God's
emissary and was granted the power
to bring light to all of France.

Ah, but don't be mistaken,
I'm not as important as all that!
I'm just a simple country girl...

If you were to call me Darc,
it would please me very much.

One day, our battles will end, and God
will permit us to leave the battlefield...
I dream of such a day sometimes.
What do you think?
You can clearly see that I'm getting stronger!

I owe it to the strength of others
that I have made it this far.

Liz always says that I am her equal,
but could I truly stand alongside her
at this level?
No, I mustn't be satisfied yet.
My sole desire was to save my homeland.

That is why I refused to resent those
who stood against me as my enemies...

But I cannot forgive those
who seek to destroy everything.
I shall save it all!
Zzz...
OH! Y-you were there this whole time?!
Did...did I get tired of waiting?
N-no! Of course not!
Oh, good morning!
I just finished my morning prayers.
I hope this day will be a good one.
The sun has risen so high in the sky!

It reminds me of the days
I spent in my village.
Such peaceful, blissful days...
It is time to eat dinner.

No matter what Melissa prepares,
it always tastes great...

I wonder what she'll serve today?
I can't wait!
Everyone I know seems to drink,

but Liz and Melissa are always telling
me I should definitely not drink.
I wonder why?
Don't grip the hilt too tightly now...

Ah, I was just practicing my
swordsmanship.
That was the first tip Liz ever told me.
Well then, let us depart...
It's time to bring light to all of France.

I will not rest until the rightful king
sits on his throne.

So we must battle Magical Girls
that bear our own faces...

I will stand against anything that
threatens my wish to save my country.
My banner is...terrible?

I-is it really? They told me to come up
with a design, so I had it embroidered
with an image of Monsieur Angel...

This outfit was presented to me 
by the people of Vaucouleurs, 
when I was making the trip to Chignon.

It's so lovely, I cannot express
my gratitude enough...

I believe my true fate is to act according
to the words of Monsieur Angel.

That day, in front of Catherine's grave,
I carved that vow into my heart.
Liz and I are almost the same age.

When I first met her I thought
she was much older than me...
She's just so very mature and reliable.
Soul Gems...

The very fact that Monsieur Angel can
transmute an intangible thing like the
spirit into a jewel proves that he is an angel!
This is divine work!

Liz has always been one to
fuss over me like an older sister.
She is my rock, a treasured friend.

I cannot even begin to thank her
for all she's done.

Liz taught me how to handle a sword
back when we were in the village...

I started learning so I could better
protect myself...and my sister.

I didn't want anyone else to see the horrors
I saw when my village was attacked.
That's why I became a Magical Girl...
to bring light to France.

This sword, the "Épée de Clovis",
lay dormant in Saint Catherine's Church.

A church named for a saint with the same
name as my sister... It must have been fate.
I will protect everyone!!!
Phew... We won.
Is everyone all right?!
Let's continue onward.
This is thanks to all of you.

My name is Darc,
and it is a delight to meet you.

"Darc" is the name Monsieur Angel
bestowed upon me, and now all my
friends address me by it.

Now I should be able to wield
my magic more skillfully.

With this I can keep my magic
under perfect control!

When I think back now...
it feels like it was so very,
very long ago.
Domrémy was my hometown.

The wish I had before becoming a Magical
Girl was no more than happiness and peace
for my treasured family and fellow villagers.

Catherine saved my life, and I used
that life to become a Magical Girl.
I don't want anyone else to suffer like that...
